post:
HostSailor: KVM, XEN, or OpenVZ in the Netherlands from $1/mo!

HostSailor, kvm, netherlands, openvz, xen April 11, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome back, HostSailor!  They last gave us an offer back on January 25, 2021.  They’re a steady advertiser on LowEndTalk and a frequent visitor to LEB.

This time they’re bringing some VPSes in the Netherlands:

  • KVMs starting at $1/mo with no annual commitment!
  • XEN VMs starting at $1/mo!
  • And OvZ starting at $1/mo (or 50 cents/mo if you check their site)!

Pretty nice for a host that has been pretty solid since they started with us way back in 2014 (when the iPhone 6 debuted, to give you some perspective).

Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in Dubai, UAE (IBC/03/14/8150). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Bitcoin, MasterCard, Altcoins, PayPal, Bank Transfer, PaySafeCard, Skrill, WebMoney, Western Union, MoneyGram, Perfect Money.

Here’s a little about HostSailor in their own words:

“HostSailor.com has established itself as a trusted provider of VPS hosting, Dedicated Servers, Domains, SSL certificates, and a variety of other hosting and complementary technology services. HostSailor.com is a truly global company with a unique focus on our customers.”

The LEB community thrives on reports from our readers about the companies they patronize, so please comment below about your experience with HostSailor.

Now read more to see the offers!
